Actions.Text: use AppleScript version "2.4"use framework "Foundation"use scripting additions----------------------------------------------------------------set appBundleID to "com.sunny.BetterAndBetter"set theURL to current application's NSWorkspace's sharedWorkspace()'s URLForApplicationWithBundleIdentifier:appBundleIDset appInfoPlist to ((theURL as text) & "Contents:Info.plist")set AppleScript's text item delimiters to " "set sysVerStr to current application's NSProcessInfo's processInfo()'s operatingSystemVersionString()set sysVerStr to text item 2 of (sysVerStr as text)set appInfoPlist to POSIX path of appInfoPlistset theDict to current application's NSDictionary's dictionaryWithContentsOfFile:appInfoPlistset verStr to ("BetterAndBetter " & (theDict's valueForKeyPath:"CFBundleShortVersionString") as text) & ¬	" on macOS " & (system version of (get system info))return verStr

Name: BAB Version and macOS System Version
